question: Which state has got award at the World Education Summit-2019?
explanation: Rajasthan has bagged the “best innovation and initiative leadership award” for its achievements in higher education in the 14th World Education Summit (WES-2019). The award was received by the Minister of State for Higher Education Bhanwar Singh Bhati at the 14th summit in New Delhi. The representatives of 8 countries and 17 States of India participated in the 2-day summit.
